title: Image optimizer, resizer and converter
hero: A desktop app to easily reduce the size, dimensions, and convert images. Supports JPG, PNG, GIF, WEBP, AVIF, TIFF, SVG, PCX, and HEIC formats. Can use the tinypng.com service engine, its own engine, or both.

featurelist.title: Simple and straightforward interface
featurelist.text: Just drag one or more image files over the program window to start the process.

featurelist.title: Available in multiple languages
featurelist.text: Currently the interface is available in portuguese, english, spanish and french.

featurelist.title: Control over the output file
featurelist.text: You can choose to overwrite the file, create a folder for the result, create a new file or even make a backup of the original.

featurelist.title: Process large files
featurelist.text: Files up to 70 MB can be sent without any problems for processing.

featurelist.title: Image resizing
featurelist.text: Scale down proportionately, scale down to fit or cover given dimensions, or create thumbnails.

featurelist.title: Image conversion
featurelist.text: Easily convert your images between different supported formats.

featurelist.title: Image metadata management
featurelist.text: Here you can choose to remove or preserve the copyright, geolocation and date of the images.

featurelist.title: Control over usage
featurelist.text: You know at all times how many compressions you did in the current month and how many images just have been processed.

featuresobs: You may wish to create an account on the tinypng.com website and get your API key to use with this app (and elsewhere). This account is completely free for up to 500 image compressions per month. Click the button below to navigate to their page.
donationtext1:
This app is a one-man band and it's not easy to create and maintain such a little panda.
I count on your help to keep Panda Cub strong, healthy and well fed!
donationtext2:
Use the QR Code or the donation button.
Any amount is welcome! Thanks in advance for your support.
donationphrase: Thanks for helping keep Panda Cub strong, healthy and well fed.

contacttext.first: Use the form below for any contact. or
contacttext.last: to send an email from your favorite mail client.

seo.desc: This app allows you to optimize and resize images in PNG, JPG and WEBP formats without any loss in quality.
seo.title: Panda Cub - Image Optimizer App
